title: Implement User Authentication API
overview: Create a comprehensive REST API for user authentication with JWT tokens, password hashing, and proper error handling. The implementation will include registration, login, logout, and token validation endpoints.

actions.title: Examine Project Structure
actions.operation: List directory contents and identify existing authentication components
actions.purpose: Understand the current project organization and existing auth infrastructure
actions.success_criteria: Clear map of project structure and identification of existing auth components

actions.title: Identify Dependencies
actions.operation: Check for existing authentication libraries (passport, bcrypt, jsonwebtoken)
actions.purpose: Determine available authentication libraries and frameworks
actions.success_criteria: Complete inventory of available auth-related dependencies

actions.title: Create User Model
actions.operation: Define User schema with email, password_hash, created_at, updated_at fields
actions.purpose: Establish the data structure for user accounts
actions.success_criteria: User model compiles and includes all required fields with proper validation

actions.title: Implement Password Hashing
actions.operation: Create functions for password hashing and verification using bcrypt
actions.purpose: Securely store user passwords using industry-standard hashing
actions.success_criteria: Password hashing and verification functions work correctly with salt rounds

actions.title: Create Authentication Routes
actions.operation: Define routes for POST /register, POST /login, POST /logout, GET /verify
actions.purpose: Provide API endpoints for authentication operations
actions.success_criteria: All authentication routes are defined with proper middleware

actions.title: Write Unit Tests
actions.operation: Create comprehensive unit tests for all authentication functions
actions.purpose: Verify authentication logic works correctly in isolation
actions.success_criteria: All unit tests pass with >90% code coverage

actions.title: Integration Testing
actions.operation: Run end-to-end tests for complete authentication flow
actions.purpose: Ensure the complete authentication system works correctly
actions.success_criteria: All integration tests pass, authentication flow works end-to-end

expected_outcome: A fully functional authentication API with secure user registration, login, logout, and token validation. The system will include comprehensive error handling, input validation, and complete test coverage ready for production deployment.
